validation.ENUM_VALUE: Must be one of the following values: __allowedValues__
validation.PASSWORD_CONFIRM: Password must be the same as your new password
validation.PASSWORD_DIFFERENT: Password must be different than your current password
validation.AT_LEAST_LOWERCASE_LETTERS: Must have at least 1 lower case letter (3 out of 4 categories)
validation.AT_LEAST_UPPERCASE_LETTERS: Must have at least 1 capital letter (3 out of 4 categories)
validation.AT_LEAST_DIGITS: Must have at least 1 number (3 out of 4 categories)
validation.AT_LEAST_SPECIAL: Must have at least 1 special character eg: !, @, $, etc (3 out of 4 categories)
